General.Name: Zhejiang Jiaxin Silk Corp Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Jiaxin Silk Corp., Ltd. manufactures and sells silk products. It offers silk, silk blended, and non-silk clothing products; silk knitted silk and silk woven silk fabrics for use in manufacture of various fashions, underwear, home textile and decorative items, etc.; and white silk products for weaving silk fabrics. The company is involved in the bleaching, dyeing and printing, and processing of grey fabrics; and manufacturing of precision hardware components, including clothing hardware, electrical hardware, electronic hardware, electrical appliance hardware, furniture hardware, etc. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Jiaxing, China.
General.Address: No. 588, Zhonghuan West Road, Jiaxing, China, 314033
